#labels Tools,Guide
= Recommended Tools to Work on S/C=
This is a short guide that describes how to get the tools that we recommend for working with Scala, Maven and SVN within the Eclipse IDE

==Eclipse==
Install the Eclipse IDE for Java Developers 3.6.2 (_Helios_) from http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/

==Scala==
Install the Scala plugin for Eclipse:
  * Within Eclipse go to _Help_, _Install New Software..._
  * Add as a new location: http://download.scala-ide.org/nightly-update-helios-2.8.1.final
  * Install all the available updates.

==Maven==
Install the _Maven integration for Eclipse_ from the _Eclipse Marketplace_: You find it in the Eclipse _Help_ menu, it's the last entry.

==SVN==
Install _Subclipse_ from the _Eclipse Marketplace_: You can find it in the Eclipse _Help_ menu, it's the last entry. We recommend to use the SVNKit client, which can be set in _Eclipse_, _Preferences..._, _Team_, _SVN_, _Client_
